name: Oxycodone
title: Oxycodone
description: This value set includes semantic clinical drugs (SCD) and generic pack (GPCK) RxNorm codes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for medications that are Schedules II and III oxycodone medications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Medication.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that identify a medication for oxycodone.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent schedule I, unscheduled, nonprescribable, non-human, and inactive oxycodone medications.)
